00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <linux/kthread.h>
00034 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00035 #include "qsd_internal.h"
00036 
00037 /*
00038  * Completion function invoked when the global quota lock enqueue has completed
00039  */
00040 static void qsd_reint_completion(const struct lu_env *env,
00041                                  struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00042                                  struct quota_body *req_qbody,
00043                                  struct quota_body *rep_qbody,
00044                                  struct lustre_handle *lockh,
00045                                  struct lquota_lvb *lvb,
00046                                  void *arg, int rc)
00047 {
00048         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00049         __u64                   *slv_ver = (__u64 *)arg;
00050         ENTRY;
00051 
00052         if (rc) {
00053                 CDEBUG_LIMIT(rc != -EAGAIN ? D_ERROR : D_QUOTA,
00054                              "%s: failed to enqueue global quota lock, glb fid:"
00055                              DFID", rc:%d\n", qsd->qsd_svname,
00056                              PFID(&req_qbody->qb_fid), rc);
00057                 RETURN_EXIT;
00058         }
00059 
00060         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: global quota lock successfully acquired, glb "
00061                "fid:"DFID", glb ver:"LPU64", slv fid:"DFID", slv ver:"LPU64"\n",
00062                qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&req_qbody->qb_fid),
00063                lvb->lvb_glb_ver, PFID(&rep_qbody->qb_slv_fid),
00064                rep_qbody->qb_slv_ver);
00065 
00066         *slv_ver = rep_qbody->qb_slv_ver;
00067         memcpy(&qqi->qqi_slv_fid, &rep_qbody->qb_slv_fid,
00068                sizeof(struct lu_fid));
00069         lustre_handle_copy(&qqi->qqi_lockh, lockh);
00070         EXIT;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static int qsd_reint_qid(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00074                          bool global, union lquota_id *qid, void *rec)
00075 {
00076         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00077         int                      rc;
00078         ENTRY;
00079 
00080         lqe = lqe_locate(env, qqi->qqi_site, qid);
00081         if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00082                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(lqe));
00083 
00084         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "reintegrating entry");
00085 
00086         rc = qsd_update_lqe(env, lqe, global, rec);
00087         if (rc)
00088                 GOTO(out, rc);
00089 
00090         rc = qsd_update_index(env, qqi, qid, global, 0, rec);
00091 out:
00092         lqe_putref(lqe);
00093         RETURN(rc);
00094 }
00095 
00096 static int qsd_reint_entries(const struct lu_env *env,
00097                              struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00098                              struct idx_info *ii, bool global,
00099                              struct page **pages,
00100                              unsigned int npages, bool need_swab)
00101 {
00102         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00103         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00104         union lquota_id         *qid = &qti->qti_id;
00105         int                      i, j, k, size;
00106         int                      rc = 0;
00107         ENTRY;
00108 
00109         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: processing %d pages for %s index\n",
00110                qsd->qsd_svname, npages, global ? "global" : "slave");
00111 
00112         /* sanity check on the record size */
00113         if ((global && ii->ii_recsize != sizeof(struct lquota_glb_rec)) ||
00114             (!global && ii->ii_recsize != sizeof(struct lquota_slv_rec))) {
00115                 CERROR("%s: invalid record size (%d) for %s index\n",
00116                        qsd->qsd_svname, ii->ii_recsize,
00117                        global ? "global" : "slave");
00118                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00119         }
00120 
00121         size = ii->ii_recsize + ii->ii_keysize;
00122 
00123         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++) {
00124                 union lu_page   *lip = kmap(pages[i]);
00125 
00126                 for (j = 0; j < LU_PAGE_COUNT; j++) {
00127                         if (need_swab)
00128                                 /* swab header */
00129                                 lustre_swab_lip_header(&lip->lp_idx);
00130 
00131                         if (lip->lp_idx.lip_magic != LIP_MAGIC) {
00132                                 CERROR("%s: invalid magic (%x != %x) for page "
00133                                        "%d/%d while transferring %s index\n",
00134                                        qsd->qsd_svname, lip->lp_idx.lip_magic,
00135                                        LIP_MAGIC, i + 1, npages,
00136                                        global ? "global" : "slave");
00137                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00138                         }
00139 
00140                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: processing page %d/%d with %d "
00141                                "entries for %s index\n", qsd->qsd_svname, i + 1,
00142                                npages, lip->lp_idx.lip_nr,
00143                                global ? "global" : "slave");
00144 
00145                         for (k = 0; k < lip->lp_idx.lip_nr; k++) {
00146                                 char *entry;
00147 
00148                                 entry = lip->lp_idx.lip_entries + k * size;
00149                                 memcpy(qid, entry, ii->ii_keysize); /* key */
00150                                 entry += ii->ii_keysize;            /* value */
00151 
00152                                 if (need_swab) {
00153                                         int offset = 0;
00154 
00155                                         /* swab key */
00156                                         __swab64s(&qid->qid_uid);
00157                                         /* quota records only include 64-bit
00158                                          * fields */
00159                                         while (offset < ii->ii_recsize) {
00160                                                 __swab64s((__u64 *)
00161                                                               (entry + offset));
00162                                                 offset += sizeof(__u64);
00163                                         }
00164                                 }
00165 
00166                                 rc = qsd_reint_qid(env, qqi, global, qid,
00167                                                    (void *)entry);
00168                                 if (rc)
00169                                         GOTO(out, rc);
00170                         }
00171                         lip++;
00172                 }
00173 out:
00174                 kunmap(pages[i]);
00175                 if (rc)
00176                         break;
00177         }
00178         RETURN(rc);
00179 }
00180 
00181 static int qsd_reint_index(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00182                            bool global)
00183 {
00184         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00185         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00186         struct idx_info         *ii = &qti->qti_ii;
00187         struct lu_fid           *fid;
00188         struct page             **pages = NULL;
00189         unsigned int             npages, pg_cnt;
00190         __u64                    start_hash = 0, ver = 0;
00191         bool                     need_swab = false;
00192         int                      i, rc;
00193         ENTRY;
00194 
00195         fid = global ? &qqi->qqi_fid : &qqi->qqi_slv_fid;
00196 
00197         /* let's do a 1MB bulk */
00198         npages = min_t(unsigned int, OFD_MAX_BRW_SIZE, 1 << 20);
00199         npages /= PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00200 
00201         /* allocate pages for bulk index read */
00202         OBD_ALLOC(pages, npages * sizeof(*pages));
00203         if (pages == NULL)
00204                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00205         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++) {
00206                 pages[i] = alloc_page(GFP_IOFS);
00207                 if (pages[i] == NULL)
00208                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00209         }
00210 
00211 repeat:
00212         /* initialize index_info request with FID of global index */
00213         memset(ii, 0, sizeof(*ii));
00214         memcpy(&ii->ii_fid, fid, sizeof(*fid));
00215         ii->ii_magic = IDX_INFO_MAGIC;
00216         ii->ii_flags = II_FL_NOHASH;
00217         ii->ii_count = npages * LU_PAGE_COUNT;
00218         ii->ii_hash_start = start_hash;
00219 
00220         /* send bulk request to quota master to read global index */
00221         rc = qsd_fetch_index(env, qsd->qsd_exp, ii, npages, pages, &need_swab);
00222         if (rc) {
00223                 CWARN("%s: failed to fetch index for "DFID". %d\n",
00224                       qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(fid), rc);
00225                 GOTO(out, rc);
00226         }
00227 
00228         /* various sanity checks */
00229         if (ii->ii_magic != IDX_INFO_MAGIC) {
00230                 CERROR("%s: invalid magic in index transfer %x != %x\n",
00231                        qsd->qsd_svname, ii->ii_magic, IDX_INFO_MAGIC);
00232                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00233         }
00234         if ((ii->ii_flags & II_FL_VARKEY) != 0)
00235                 CWARN("%s: II_FL_VARKEY is set on index transfer for fid "DFID
00236                       ", it shouldn't be\n", qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(fid));
00237         if ((ii->ii_flags & II_FL_NONUNQ) != 0)
00238                 CWARN("%s: II_FL_NONUNQ is set on index transfer for fid "DFID
00239                       ", it shouldn't be\n", qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(fid));
00240         if (ii->ii_keysize != sizeof(__u64)) {
00241                 CERROR("%s: invalid key size reported on index transfer for "
00242                        "fid "DFID", %u != %u\n", qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(fid),
00243                        ii->ii_keysize, (int)sizeof(__u64));
00244                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00245         }
00246         if (ii->ii_version == 0 && ii->ii_count != 0)
00247                 CWARN("%s: index version for fid "DFID" is 0, but index isn't "
00248                       "empty (%d)\n", qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(fid), ii->ii_count);
00249 
00250         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: reintegration process for fid "DFID" successfully "
00251                "fetched %s index, count = %d\n", qsd->qsd_svname,
00252                PFID(fid), global ? "global" : "slave", ii->ii_count);
00253 
00254         if (start_hash == 0)
00255                 /* record version associated with the first bulk transfer */
00256                 ver = ii->ii_version;
00257 
00258         pg_cnt = (ii->ii_count + (LU_PAGE_COUNT) - 1);
00259         pg_cnt >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT - LU_PAGE_SHIFT;
00260 
00261         if (pg_cnt > npages) {
00262                 CERROR("%s: master returned more pages than expected, %u > %u"
00263                        "\n", qsd->qsd_svname, pg_cnt, npages);
00264                 pg_cnt = npages;
00265         }
00266 
00267         rc = qsd_reint_entries(env, qqi, ii, global, pages, pg_cnt, need_swab);
00268         if (rc)
00269                 GOTO(out, rc);
00270 
00271         if (ii->ii_hash_end != II_END_OFF) {
00272                 start_hash = ii->ii_hash_end;
00273                 goto repeat;
00274         }
00275 out:
00276         if (pages != NULL) {
00277                 for (i = 0; i < npages; i++)
00278                         if (pages[i] != NULL)
00279                                 __free_page(pages[i]);
00280                 OBD_FREE(pages, npages * sizeof(*pages));
00281         }
00282 
00283         /* Update index version */
00284         if (rc == 0) {
00285                 rc = qsd_write_version(env, qqi, ver, global);
00286                 if (rc)
00287                         CERROR("%s: write version "LPU64" to "DFID" failed. "
00288                                "%d\n", qsd->qsd_svname, ver, PFID(fid), rc);
00289         }
00290 
00291         RETURN(rc);
00292 }
00293 
00294 static int qsd_reconciliation(const struct lu_env *env,
00295                               struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi)
00296 {
00297         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00298         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00299         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00300         struct dt_it            *it;
00301         struct dt_key           *key;
00302         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00303         union lquota_id         *qid = &qti->qti_id;
00304         int                      rc;
00305         ENTRY;
00306 
00307         LASSERT(qqi->qqi_glb_obj != NULL);
00308         iops = &qqi->qqi_glb_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00309 
00310         it = iops->init(env, qqi->qqi_glb_obj, 0);
00311         if (IS_ERR(it)) {
00312                 CWARN("%s: Initialize it for "DFID" failed. %ld\n",
00313                       qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid), PTR_ERR(it));
00314                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(it));
00315         }
00316 
00317         rc = iops->load(env, it, 0);
00318         if (rc < 0) {
00319                 CWARN("%s: Load first entry for "DFID" failed. %d\n",
00320                       qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid), rc);
00321                 GOTO(out, rc);
00322         } else if (rc == 0) {
00323                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
00324                 if (rc != 0)
00325                         GOTO(out, rc = (rc < 0) ? rc : 0);
00326         }
00327 
00328         do {
00329                 key = iops->key(env, it);
00330                 if (IS_ERR(key)) {
00331                         CWARN("%s: Error key for "DFID". %ld\n",
00332                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid),
00333                               PTR_ERR(key));
00334                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(key));
00335                 }
00336 
00337                 /* skip the root user/group */
00338                 if (*((__u64 *)key) == 0)
00339                         goto next;
00340 
00341                 qid->qid_uid = *((__u64 *)key);
00342 
00343                 lqe = lqe_locate(env, qqi->qqi_site, qid);
00344                 if (IS_ERR(lqe)) {
00345                         CWARN("%s: failed to locate lqe. "DFID", %ld\n",
00346                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid),
00347                               PTR_ERR(lqe));
00348                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(lqe));
00349                 }
00350 
00351                 rc = qsd_refresh_usage(env, lqe);
00352                 if (rc) {
00353                         CWARN("%s: failed to get usage. "DFID", %d\n",
00354                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid), rc);
00355                         lqe_putref(lqe);
00356                         GOTO(out, rc);
00357                 }
00358 
00359                 rc = qsd_adjust(env, lqe);
00360                 lqe_putref(lqe);
00361                 if (rc) {
00362                         CWARN("%s: failed to report quota. "DFID", %d\n",
00363                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid), rc);
00364                         GOTO(out, rc);
00365                 }
00366 next:
00367                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
00368                 if (rc < 0)
00369                         CWARN("%s: failed to parse index, ->next error:%d "DFID
00370                               "\n", qsd->qsd_svname, rc, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid));
00371         } while (rc == 0);
00372 
00373         /* reach the end */
00374         if (rc > 0)
00375                 rc = 0;
00376 out:
00377         iops->put(env, it);
00378         iops->fini(env, it);
00379         RETURN(rc);
00380 }
00381 
00382 static int qsd_connected(struct qsd_instance *qsd)
00383 {
00384         int     connected;
00385 
00386         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00387         connected = qsd->qsd_exp_valid ? 1 : 0;
00388         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00389 
00390         return connected;
00391 }
00392 
00393 static int qsd_started(struct qsd_instance *qsd)
00394 {
00395         int     started;
00396 
00397         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00398         started = qsd->qsd_started ? 1 : 0;
00399         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00400 
00401         return started;
00402 }
00403 
00404 /*
00405  * Routine executed by the reintegration thread.
00406  */
00407 static int qsd_reint_main(void *args)
00408 {
00409         struct lu_env           *env;
00410         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti;
00411         struct qsd_qtype_info   *qqi = (struct qsd_qtype_info *)args;
00412         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00413         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &qqi->qqi_reint_thread;
00414         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
00415         int                      rc;
00416         ENTRY;
00417 
00418         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: Starting reintegration thread for "DFID"\n",
00419                qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid));
00420 
00421         qqi_getref(qqi);
00422         lu_ref_add(&qqi->qqi_reference, "reint_thread", thread);
00423 
00424         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_RUNNING);
00425         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00426 
00427         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00428         if (env == NULL)
00429                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00430 
00431         /* initialize environment */
00432         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_DT_THREAD);
00433         if (rc)
00434                 GOTO(out_env, rc);
00435         qti = qsd_info(env);
00436 
00437         /* wait for the connection to master established */
00438         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00439                      qsd_connected(qsd) || !thread_is_running(thread), &lwi);
00440 
00441         /* Step 1: enqueue global index lock */
00442         if (!thread_is_running(thread))
00443                 GOTO(out_env_init, rc = 0);
00444 
00445         LASSERT(qsd->qsd_exp != NULL);
00446         LASSERT(qqi->qqi_glb_uptodate == 0 || qqi->qqi_slv_uptodate == 0);
00447 
00448         memset(&qti->qti_lvb, 0, sizeof(qti->qti_lvb));
00449 
00450         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00451         /* check whether we already own a global quota lock for this type */
00452         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&qqi->qqi_lockh) &&
00453             ldlm_lock_addref_try(&qqi->qqi_lockh, qsd_glb_einfo.ei_mode) == 0) {
00454                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00455                 /* force refresh of global & slave index copy */
00456                 qti->qti_lvb.lvb_glb_ver = ~0ULL;
00457                 qti->qti_slv_ver = ~0ULL;
00458         } else {
00459                 /* no valid lock found, let's enqueue a new one */
00460                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00461 
00462                 memset(&qti->qti_body, 0, sizeof(qti->qti_body));
00463                 memcpy(&qti->qti_body.qb_fid, &qqi->qqi_fid,
00464                        sizeof(qqi->qqi_fid));
00465 
00466                 rc = qsd_intent_lock(env, qsd->qsd_exp, &qti->qti_body, true,
00467                                      IT_QUOTA_CONN, qsd_reint_completion, qqi,
00468                                      &qti->qti_lvb, (void *)&qti->qti_slv_ver);
00469                 if (rc)
00470                         GOTO(out_env_init, rc);
00471 
00472                 CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: glb_ver:"LPU64"/"LPU64",slv_ver:"LPU64"/"
00473                        LPU64"\n", qsd->qsd_svname,
00474                        qti->qti_lvb.lvb_glb_ver, qqi->qqi_glb_ver,
00475                        qti->qti_slv_ver, qqi->qqi_slv_ver);
00476         }
00477 
00478         /* Step 2: reintegrate global index */
00479         if (!thread_is_running(thread))
00480                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = 0);
00481 
00482         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_QUOTA_DELAY_REINT, 10);
00483 
00484         if (qqi->qqi_glb_ver != qti->qti_lvb.lvb_glb_ver) {
00485                 rc = qsd_reint_index(env, qqi, true);
00486                 if (rc) {
00487                         CWARN("%s: reint global for "DFID" failed. %d\n",
00488                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_fid), rc);
00489                         GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00490                 }
00491         } else {
00492                 qsd_bump_version(qqi, qqi->qqi_glb_ver, true);
00493         }
00494 
00495         /* Step 3: reintegrate slave index */
00496         if (!thread_is_running(thread))
00497                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = 0);
00498 
00499         if (qqi->qqi_slv_ver != qti->qti_slv_ver) {
00500                 rc = qsd_reint_index(env, qqi, false);
00501                 if (rc) {
00502                         CWARN("%s: reintegration for "DFID" failed with %d\n",
00503                               qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_slv_fid), rc);
00504                         GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00505                 }
00506         } else {
00507                 qsd_bump_version(qqi, qqi->qqi_slv_ver, false);
00508         }
00509 
00510         /* wait for the qsd instance started (target recovery done) */
00511         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00512                      qsd_started(qsd) || !thread_is_running(thread), &lwi);
00513 
00514         if (!thread_is_running(thread))
00515                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = 0);
00516 
00517         /* Step 4: start reconciliation for each enforced ID */
00518         rc = qsd_reconciliation(env, qqi);
00519         if (rc)
00520                 CWARN("%s: reconciliation for "DFID" failed with %d\n",
00521                       qsd->qsd_svname, PFID(&qqi->qqi_slv_fid), rc);
00522 
00523         EXIT;
00524 out_lock:
00525         ldlm_lock_decref(&qqi->qqi_lockh, qsd_glb_einfo.ei_mode);
00526 out_env_init:
00527         lu_env_fini(env);
00528 out_env:
00529         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00530 out:
00531         write_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00532         qqi->qqi_reint = 0;
00533         write_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00534 
00535         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPED);
00536         wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00537 
00538         lu_ref_del(&qqi->qqi_reference, "reint_thread", thread);
00539         qqi_putref(qqi);
00540 
00541         return rc;
00542 }
00543 
00544 void qsd_stop_reint_thread(struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi)
00545 {
00546         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &qqi->qqi_reint_thread;
00547         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
00548 
00549         if (!thread_is_stopped(thread)) {
00550                 thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
00551                 wake_up(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
00552 
00553                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00554                              thread_is_stopped(thread), &lwi);
00555         }
00556 }
00557 
00558 static int qsd_entry_iter_cb(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00559                              struct hlist_node *hnode, void *data)
00560 {
00561         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00562         int                     *pending = (int *)data;
00563 
00564         lqe = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lquota_entry, lqe_hash);
00565         LASSERT(atomic_read(&lqe->lqe_ref) > 0);
00566 
00567         lqe_read_lock(lqe);
00568         *pending += lqe->lqe_pending_req;
00569         lqe_read_unlock(lqe);
00570 
00571         return 0;
00572 }
00573 
00574 static bool qsd_pending_updates(struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi)
00575 {
00576         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00577         struct qsd_upd_rec      *upd;
00578         struct lquota_entry     *lqe, *n;
00579         int                      dqacq = 0;
00580         bool                     updates = false;
00581         ENTRY;
00582 
00583         /* any pending quota adjust? */
00584         spin_lock(&qsd->qsd_adjust_lock);
00585         list_for_each_entry_safe(lqe, n, &qsd->qsd_adjust_list, lqe_link) {
00586                 if (lqe2qqi(lqe) == qqi) {
00587                         list_del_init(&lqe->lqe_link);
00588                         lqe_putref(lqe);
00589                 }
00590         }
00591         spin_unlock(&qsd->qsd_adjust_lock);
00592 
00593         /* any pending updates? */
00594         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00595         list_for_each_entry(upd, &qsd->qsd_upd_list, qur_link) {
00596                 if (upd->qur_qqi == qqi) {
00597                         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00598                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: pending %s updates for type:%d.\n",
00599                                qsd->qsd_svname,
00600                                upd->qur_global ? "global" : "slave",
00601                                qqi->qqi_qtype);
00602                         GOTO(out, updates = true);
00603                 }
00604         }
00605         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00606 
00607         /* any pending quota request? */
00608         cfs_hash_for_each_safe(qqi->qqi_site->lqs_hash, qsd_entry_iter_cb,
00609                                &dqacq);
00610         if (dqacq) {
00611                 CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: pending dqacq for type:%d.\n",
00612                        qsd->qsd_svname, qqi->qqi_qtype);
00613                 updates = true;
00614         }
00615         EXIT;
00616 out:
00617         if (updates)
00618                 CERROR("%s: Delaying reintegration for qtype:%d until pending "
00619                        "updates are flushed.\n",
00620                        qsd->qsd_svname, qqi->qqi_qtype);
00621         return updates;
00622 }
00623 
00624 int qsd_start_reint_thread(struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi)
00625 {
00626         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &qqi->qqi_reint_thread;
00627         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00628         struct l_wait_info       lwi = { 0 };
00629         struct task_struct      *task;
00630         int                      rc;
00631         char                    *name;
00632         ENTRY;
00633 
00634         /* don't bother to do reintegration when quota isn't enabled */
00635         if (!qsd_type_enabled(qsd, qqi->qqi_qtype))
00636                 RETURN(0);
00637 
00638         if (qsd->qsd_acct_failed)
00639                 /* no space accounting support, can't enable enforcement */
00640                 RETURN(0);
00641 
00642         /* check if the reintegration has already started or finished */
00643         write_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00644 
00645         if ((qqi->qqi_glb_uptodate && qqi->qqi_slv_uptodate) ||
00646              qqi->qqi_reint || qsd->qsd_stopping) {
00647                 write_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00648                 RETURN(0);
00649         }
00650         qqi->qqi_reint = 1;
00651 
00652         write_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00653 
00654         /* there could be some unfinished global or index entry updates
00655          * (very unlikely), to avoid them messing up with the reint
00656          * procedure, we just return and try to re-start reint later. */
00657         if (qsd_pending_updates(qqi)) {
00658                 write_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00659                 qqi->qqi_reint = 0;
00660                 write_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00661                 RETURN(0);
00662         }
00663 
00664         OBD_ALLOC(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00665         if (name == NULL)
00666                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00667 
00668         snprintf(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN, "qsd_reint_%d.%s",
00669                  qqi->qqi_qtype, qsd->qsd_svname);
00670 
00671         task = kthread_run(qsd_reint_main, qqi, name);
00672         OBD_FREE(name, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00673 
00674         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
00675                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
00676                 thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPED);
00677                 write_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00678                 qqi->qqi_reint = 0;
00679                 write_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00680                 RETURN(rc);
00681         }
00682 
00683         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
00684                      thread_is_running(thread) || thread_is_stopped(thread),
00685                      &lwi);
00686         RETURN(0);
00687 }
